official_title: Amending the joint resolution entitled "A joint resolution providing for the designation of the third week of July as 'Captive Nations Week'".

summary.text: Amends Federal law to revise the preamble of S.J.Res. 111 (86th Congress) that designates the third week of July 1959 as Captive Nations Week.

titles.title: Amending the joint resolution entitled "A joint resolution providing for the designation of the third week of July as 'Captive Nations Week'".
